nodes.text: The Y7-O1 Astromech Droid was a model of astromech droid that was used at the Balmorran Arms Factory on the planet Balmorra near the end of the Cold War.

Y7-O1 Astromech Droids appear as enemies in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found in the Administrative Center of the Balmorran Arms Factory on the Imperial version of Balmorra.
